"Xiera":
"You've learned the Photon Art!
Next, let's set the Photon Art you learned to your Weapon Palette."

"・Select [Equip Weapons] from
\u3000the main menu
・Select a slot
・Select the Photon Art you
\u3000want to set"

"You can learn Photon Arts from items called \"PA Disks\".

You can use Photon Arts that you have learned by setting them to a weapon's palette.

\"PA Disks\" can drop randomly when defeating enemies or breaking containers."
